name: Guinaifen
story: A performance artist visiting the Xianzhou Luofu — in other words, a street performer.She's chasing a new life on the Luofu when not concerned with food and shelter.

skills.name: Standing Ovation
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Blazing Welcome
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and minor Fire DMG to adjacent enemies, with a high chance of Burning them.

skills.name: Watch This Showstopper
skills.description: Deals Fire DMG to all enemies. If the enemies are inflicted with Burn, the Burn status deals DMG 1 extra time.

skills.name: PatrAeon Benefits
skills.description: After the Burn status causes DMG on the enemy, there is a high chance of applying Firekiss to the enemy.

skills.name: Skill Showcase
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Fire DMG to a single target while applying Firekiss, with a total of 4 Bounces.

eidolons.name: Slurping Noodles During Handstand
eidolons.description: When Skill is used, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the attacked target enemy's Effect RES by 10% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Brushing Teeth While Whistling
eidolons.description: When an enemy target is being Burned, the DMG multiplier of the Burn status applied by her Basic ATK or Skill increases by 40%.

eidolons.name: Smashing Boulder on Chest
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Blocking Pike with Neck
eidolons.description: Every time the Burn status inflicted by Guinaifen causes DMG, Guinaifen regenerates 2 Energy.

eidolons.name: Swallowing Sword to Stomach
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Catching Bullet with Hands
eidolons.description: Increases the stackable Firekiss count by 1.
